name: uhgrss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wss(cfv(c2, c1), c3))

stmt.origin: elpwid(cfv(c2, c1), c3, wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))))
stmt.pretty: elpwid((c2 ` c1), c3, (c0 ∈ UHGraph ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wss(cfv(c2, c1), c3))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cpw(c3)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ UHGraph ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2))→(c2 ` c1)⊆ c3)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ UHGraph ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2))→(c2 ` c1)∈ P(c3))
